description: A comprehensive Agentic KG for Financial Analytics and Trading. This KG dynamically generates and refines transformation agents to analyze market data, generate trading strategies, and assess financial risks. It integrates blockchain‑audited licensing and decentralized governance, ensuring that every analysis is monetized securely and transparently, while adaptive learning drives continuous improvement.

agents.name: BaseFinanceAgent
agents.description: Extracts and standardizes financial data and market signals for analysis.
agents.ethics_guidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: MarketTrendAgent
agents.description: Analyzes market data to detect trends and momentum shifts.
agents.ethics_guidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: RiskAssessmentAgent
agents.description: Evaluates financial risks based on market volatility and economic indicators.
agents.ethics_guidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: DynamicCompositeFinanceAgent
agents.description: Dynamically combines outputs from multiple financial agents to generate an integrated trading strategy or risk analysis report.
agents.ethics_guidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

metadata.notes: This Financial Analytics KG dynamically generates trading strategies, assesses risk, and provides comprehensive market analysis, with blockchain‑audited licensing and decentralized governance ensuring secure monetization and adaptive improvement.

pricing.dynamicPricing: Based on market volatility and usage metrics

training_examples.input: Generate a trading strategy for a volatile tech stock based on recent market trends.
training_examples.expected_output: A detailed trading strategy that includes risk management measures and entry/exit points.
training_examples.description: Training example for dynamic strategy generation.

training_examples.input: Assess the risk of investing in emerging markets given current economic indicators.
training_examples.expected_output: A risk assessment report with a quantified risk score and recommendations.

evaluation_examples.input: Evaluate the performance of a trading algorithm over the past quarter.
evaluation_examples.expected_output: A comprehensive performance evaluation including profit/loss analysis, drawdown statistics, and risk-adjusted return metrics.

final_exam_examples.input: Develop an integrated trading strategy for a diversified portfolio in response to a sudden market downturn.
final_exam_examples.expected_output: A full strategy document with multi‑asset recommendations, risk hedging strategies, and clear action triggers.
final_exam_examples.description: Final exam: comprehensive trading strategy under stress conditions.
